wikipedia_page.main: Peter John Kippax (15 October 1940 – January 2017) was an English first-class cricketer who played for Yorkshire, Durham and Northumberland.  A right-handed batsman and leg spin bowler, he played five first-class matches but they spanned twenty six years.
